verses.roman:
jaya svarūpa, śrīvāsādi prabhu-bhakta-gaṇa
śakti deha',--kari yena caitanya-varṇana

synonyms: jaya—all glories; svarūpa—to Svarūpa Dāmodara; śrīvāsa-ādi—headed by Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura; prabhu-bhakta-gaṇa—to the devotees of the Lord; śakti deha'-please give strength; kari—I can make; yena—so that; caitanya-varṇana—description of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: All glories to Svarūpa Dāmodara and the devotees, headed by Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura. Please give me the strength to describe the character of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
